channel.title: Linux VPs open port and transfer files over
channel.description: I bought Linux VPs and I know how to connect to them with SSH they are active and working and stuff. I just don't know how to portforward on them and how to transfer my server files to my VPs hard drive. Help please. If this is the wrong category sorry.
